verses.verse: Look! <S%H1288><s%> Praise Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all you servants <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who stand <S%H5975><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house! <S%H1004><s%>
Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your hands <S%H3027><s%> in the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%> Praise <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%>
May Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you from Zion; <S%H6726><s%> even he who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
